FuncDef:
The capture drop-packet buffer-overflow enable command enables the packet loss visualization function for packets that are discarded due to a full buffer.
The undo capture drop-packet buffer-overflow enable command disables the packet loss visualization function for packets that are discarded due to a full buffer. The capture drop-packet buffer-overflow enable command enables the packet loss visualization function for packets that are discarded due to a full buffer. The undo capture drop-packet buffer-overflow enable command disables the packet loss visualization function for packets that are discarded due to a full buffer. By default, the packet loss visualization function for the packets that are discarded due to a full buffer is disabled.
